meanings.definition: The quality or state of being choppy.
meanings.sent1: The choppiness of the water made it difficult to sail smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The choppiness of her writing style made it hard to follow the story.
meanings.sent3: The choppiness of the dance routine added a fun twist to the performance.
meanings.sent4: The choppiness of the conversation mirrored the turbulent emotions in the room.
meanings.sent5: The choppiness of the road made the car bounce up and down like a rollercoaster.

meanings.definition: The rough, irregular quality of a body of water caused by waves or currents.
meanings.sent1: The boat struggled to navigate through the choppiness of the sea.
meanings.sent2: The choppiness of the lake made it challenging for swimmers to stay afloat.
meanings.sent3: The choppiness of the water splashed playfully against the shore.
meanings.sent4: The choppiness of the river resembled a wild, untamed beast.
meanings.sent5: The choppiness of the ocean waves created a mesmerizing pattern against the horizon.
